lead_paragraph: The federal decision opened the way for possibly hundreds of challenges to sentences made since a 2004 Supreme Court ruling.
snippet: The federal decision opened the way for possibly hundreds of challenges to sentences made since a 2004 Supreme Court ruling.

headline.print_headline: New York Sentencing Law on Repeat Felons Is Ruled Unconstitutional
headline.main: N.Y. Repeat Felon Law Is Found Unconstitutional
headline.seo: Appeals Court Faults New York Repeat Felons Law
headline.sub: Ruling Says Juries Must Be Involved;
